features: 🌱 THE FACE TONER SENSITIVE SKIN LOVES: You already know the benefits of Hyaluronic Acid for deep moisturization. So you’ll love our Balancing Complex of Healing Vitamins (B5, C, E) and Organic Soothing Botanicals. Enjoy the rewards without the irritation! Finally, a hydrating face mist skin toner that loves the skin you’re in - a remarkably gentle and delicately scented facial toner for women of all skin types!

🌱 A NATURAL GLOW YOU CAN’T HIDE: The secret to this simple toner lies is in its Eastern-Infusion Blend: Ginseng boosts blood circulation and brightens skin complexion while Green Tea soothes inflammation and gives natural toning. The result? The bright, even skin tone you were born with!

🌱 PH 5.5 SIMPLE SKIN CARE: You probably know most ‘natural’ toners can contain harsh chemicals too. But it’s not necessary! The truth is to balance the pH, while providing quenching moisture from Witch Hazel Extract, Grapefruit Seed Extract, Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Organic Rose Water and glycerin. Balanced skin is beautiful skin.

🌱 A FRESH SKINCARE REGIMEN: Naturally, you want only the gentlest, pH 5.5 products that are designed to work together. When you order our Retinol Face Cream, Eye Cream, and Soapberry Facial Cleanser, your delicate skin will thank you for treating it right. As a gentle rose water toner face spray, it’s lightly scented with no added perfumes and unwanted chemicals, just like all our wellness formulas.

🌱 TRIAL IT AND SEE: With its Eastern-Infusion Blend, it’s easy to see how this unique face mist spray will give you the glowing skin you’ve been waiting for, while soothing sensitive skin at the same time. Because when your skin is balanced, it needs nothing else… except maybe a special occasion to show off! Love your toned, pH-Balanced Skin from your new favorite facial spray - or we’ll refund every cent.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DISCLAIMER: At Tree to Tub, we prioritize accurate product information, but note that updates may occur due to manufacturing changes in packaging and ingredients; rest assured, our products are always fresh and effective, even if occasionally shipped with different packaging.

Gentle For All For normal to even very sensitive types because all skin needs extra loving care. Skin Friendly pH Protect your skin with pH balanced formulas. Say goodbye to irritations! Natural Fragrance No artificial, overpowering smell. Just light, natural scents from essential oils. Clean Ingredients When we say clean, we mean it! Only the purest, straight Mother Nature.

Step 1 - Foaming Face Wash Kind To Combination Skin: This oil free face wash for dry skin combats oily zones and restores moisture harmony. View Product Step 2 - Facial Toner Spray A Gentle Reset: This pH-balanced witch hazel alcohol free toner lands deep in the skin, lifting out dirt, oil & grime for a refreshed complexion. Step 3 - Purifying Clay Mask Gentle Pore Rescue: This pore cleansing mask draws out the deeply embedded residues with Charcoal, Kaolin & Bentonite Clay. View Product Step 4 - Serum Love The Skin You Are In: Apply this all-in-one anti aging serum nightly. Wake up to the perfect skin you were born with! View Product Step 5 - Face Moisturizer Daily Pampering Care: A true face moisturizer for sensitive skin like this one will make your skin feel as good as it looks! View Product Step 6 - Retinol Face Cream Look Younger: A perfectly formulated retinol cream like this anti wrinkle face cream will visibly reduce wrinkles, fine lines & pore size. View Product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been buying these products for several years and really love them. They work, and don’t smell chemically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sooooooo refreshing and nourishing to the face!!
reviews.reviewText: These products a perfect for my sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good & Feels refreshing!!!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE!!! This toner has helped the appearance of my skin tone, and has help balance my combination skin. I have a oily forehead, chin, and jaw line. Then I have patches of eczema on my cheeks and under eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great company, cool new product!
reviews.reviewText: This product is pretty nice. The ingredients are something I always look at when buying products so having a product that isn't full of unnecessary ingredients is great. I like the spray bottle style. It took me a bit to get used to, but it's much easier and quicker than toners that require application with a cotton pad. I mist my face after getting out of the shower, and at night after washing my face before bed. It has a pleasant sent and feels nice misting the face. I have been using this product on and off for a few weeks now a long with a couple other new products so it's hard to tell how just this is affecting my face, but I skin has been looking nicer lately with my new regiment. I've also sprayed this over my damp hair by my scalp and worked it into the skin. My hair was very nice and soft and didn't get greasy at all which usually happens after a day of work. I'm hoping to experiment more with this product on its own to see how it helps my oily skin without other products, so far it seems to be working very nicely though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this spray!! Use it daily as part of my skin care routine but have also used it on sunburns, bug bites, and rashes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product is great
reviews.reviewText: I like the product. It is also health based.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Tree To Tub I can't praise you enough for making the perfect toner! No, really!! My face was breaking out, & somewhere between dry, oily & desperate. I had been throwing everything at it in hopes one of the endless line of products would work they way they promised on the label, but it was all for not. Until I took a chance on your 5.5 pH balancing hydrating and calming toner. Honestly, by now even my attitude stunk...lol. As I was applying this toner I said "one more thing that probably doesn't work, just another waste of money". I am not exaggerating when I tell you that I felt my skin relax, it felt perfect, it was truly balanced. No additional pimples the next day, & the ones I had started to heal. Over the course of a week, my face was in love with your product. I have been buying it since. Halleluiah!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024

reviews.reviewText: El producto es bueno pero el envío se demoró demasiado
